summary: Hi. I have been working as a web developer since the fall of 2015, starting with simple websites on native PHP. Next was the development experience with the Laravel 5 framework.

Now I'm developing SPA applications using React / Vue.js and Node.js + (Express/Sails/socket.io) for back-end (monolith/ microservices). Also I develop mobile applications (Android/iOS) using React Native and desktop using ElectronJS.
